title: Synthesis and elucidation of strained galactopyronose esters as selective cyclooxygenase-2 inhibitor: a comprehensive computational approach
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30469-30481
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03520H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mohammed Sakib Musa, Md. Sopon Miah, Yeasmin Akter Munni, Md. Abdul Majed Patwary, Mohsin Kazi, Mohammed Mahbubul Matin
A novel class of SEs-based NSAIDs is produced by the synthesis and selective inhibition of cyclooxygenase-2 (COX-2) by strained acyl galactopyranoses.
